translations: 贫民窟，棚屋区；<非正式>脏乱的房子（或房间）
<非正式>（短期）去贫穷地方，过简朴生活

sentences.sentence: This bum is an unemployed man in the slum.
sentences.translation: 这个流浪汉是贫民区的一个失业者。

sentences.sentence: Several businessmen had to slum it in economy class.
sentences.translation: 几个商人只好将就着坐在经济舱里。

sentences.sentence: In Sal Paulo, you can see shopping malls full of designer goods right next door to the slum areas without proper water and electricity supplies.
sentences.translation: 在萨尔保罗，你可以看到紧挨着贫民区的购物中心里满是名牌商品，却没有适当的水电供应。
